daily_fact: New York City's late fall skies are illuminated with stunning comets and shooting stars, offering residents a breathtaking celestial display to enjoy together.
topline_md: Recent updates from New York City include tragic flooding incidents resulting in two deaths, a shooting in Hell's Kitchen, and the upcoming mayoral election highlighting issues like school control and housing. Additionally, NYC is launching emergency food efforts amid SNAP benefit cuts and advancing major redevelopment projects.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- NYC flooding has resulted in the deaths of two men in flooded basements in Manhattan and Brooklyn. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
items: - NYC flooding: 2 men died in flooded basements in Manhattan, Brooklyn - ABC7 New York - ABC7 New York (source: ABC7 New York, Fri, 31 Oct 2025 18:16:06 GMT)

Link: https://news.google.?oc=5
